Author: extremium
Title: 🔥🔥🔥[ANN][PRE-SALE]EXTREMIUM - Global Investment Platform Based on Neural Network
Body: Users will have the possibility to invest in the platform right after the token sale. This opportunity is expected to launch 3 weeks after the end of the token sale (Feb. 1). After this date, platform users can see the return percentage of the neural network. Currently, the neural network works automatically, but requires adjustments from time to time, which at the moment can only be made by an expert. We want to automate this process in the future, so each user will have the possibility to use prediction software themselves. That is why we started a token sale, and what we want to achieve in the future.

Author: extremium
Title: 🔥🔥🔥[ANN][PRE-SALE]EXTREMIUM - Global Investment Platform Based on Neural Network
Body: Yes, you are right, unfortunately no one can guarantee future success in the cryptocurrency industry, because we all depend on the success of the industry as a whole. All that we can do is hope for the best and contribute to enhancing its influence on the global market through expanding the number of products built on blockchain technology and popularizing cryptocurrency among ordinary users. Our project is doing just that and this is what we are trying to achieve.

Title: 🔥🔥🔥[ANN][PRE-SALE]EXTREMIUM - Global Investment Platform Based on Neural Network
Body: Neural networks are applicable to all types of information. They are used in the recognition of video, audio and text data. They are actively used in modern translators, such as Google Translate. In the management of cars on autopilot, such as with Tesla. In social networks for face recognition, for example with Instagram. Even the latest iPhone X from Apple could not do without the use of a neural network for face recognition when unlocking a smartphone. Therefore, it is quite logical to apply neural networks to predict the exchange rate. And it does not matter what kind of asset it is: fiat currencies, gold or cryptocurrencies.

Author: extremium
Title: 🔥🔥🔥[ANN][PRE-SALE]EXTREMIUM - Global Investment Platform Based on Neural Network
Body: WEBSITE l WHITEPAPER l FACEBOOK l TWITTER l TELEGRAM l BOUNTY   What is Extremium?   Extremium is the first blockchain-based investment platform, which allows you to invest in digital assets and receive passive income generated by the work of the Enhanced Self-Organizing Incremental Neural Network for Cryptocurrency Trading. The main objective of the platform is to reduce the risks of investing in cryptocurrency and overcome difficulties associated with the analysis, trading and management of cryptocurrency.  Our vision  In the modern world, when cryptocurrencies have been integrated into many spheres of human activity, no one doubts that this technology can change the world, because it is happening right now before our very eyes. In addition to powerful technology, a new branch of the economy was born, which attracted a lot of investors.  However, because of the high volatility and unpredictability of price movements, only a few investors are able to properly manage assets, and often bear losses. Therefore, the most urgent question currently has been: “How do I invest in cryptocurrency and get a stable and regular income, which will not depend on the current price in the market and recent news?”  This is the task set by the Extremium team - to help investors receive a stable and regular profit, without delving into the technical details of market forecasting. This task is undertaken by our Enhanced Self-Organizing Incremental Neural Network, which allows our investors to receive passive income and stop worrying about Bitcoin price.   Explainer Video            Pre-sale  The pre-sale will last 20 days from the 10th of November 2018 to the 30th of November 2018. This is best time to purchase tokens at the cheapest price: $0.5 per token.  Public sale  The public sale will last 40 days from the 1st of December 2018 to the 10th of January 2019. The price starts from $1.00 per token and will increase each round, to the final price of $2.00 per token.  Join Our Team!  1. Official Website: https://extremium.io/ 2. Whitepaper: https://extremium.io/whitepaper.pdf 3. Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/extremium 4. Twitter: https://twitter.com/extremium_io 5. Telegram Channel: https://t.me/joinchat/AAAAAE6l3BQyE1F8c6OIVg

Author: Praetorian.1legion
Title: 🔥🔥🔥[ANN][PRE-SALE]EXTREMIUM - Global Investment Platform Based on Neural Network
Body: Do I understand correctly that the goal of the project is the creation of a trading robot? And what role will the neural network play in this robot?

Author: geosaral
Title: 🔥🔥🔥[ANN][PRE-SALE]EXTREMIUM - Global Investment Platform Based on Neural Network
Body: What do you mean with word "NEURAL"? And how you calculate passive income as 20%? Why not 25 or 15?

Author: extremium
Title: 🔥🔥🔥[ANN][PRE-SALE]EXTREMIUM - Global Investment Platform Based on Neural Network
Body: Thank you for the question.  Our software is much more functional than a usual trading robot. Trading bots trade within one exchange, receiving income as a result of buying currencies at a low price and selling them at a higher price. But all trading actions are set by the trader. Trading bots do not know how to predict changes in the price of assets. They only perform automatic, preset actions set by the trader. So, for example, if the trader sets a certain price at which the bot must buy/sell, the bot will do this. But, after this scenario the price can go much higher/lower and the trader will make a loss.   At the core of our trading software is the Self-Organizing Incremental Neural Network. This means that the software can predict prices and perform buy/sell actions without being set by traders. In one situation, the neural network can make a decision to hold cryptocurrency longer. In another, to sell most pieces of an asset and buy another cryptocurrency, which by analysis will give a higher profit. That generally allows receiving much more income and saving time.  Also, one of the strongest part of our neural network is "incremental learning", allowing it to be "self-trained" during the work and improve its accuracy of predictions.  Neural networks are state-of-the-art, trainable algorithms that emulate certain major aspects of the functioning of the human brain. Together with the complex set of analyses and mathematical calculations of which the human brain is not capable, they have an unique, self-training ability. The ability to formalize unclassified information and, most importantly, make forecasts based on the historical information they have at their disposal.  More detailed technical information can be found in our Whitepaper.

Author: extremium
Title: 🔥🔥🔥[ANN][PRE-SALE]EXTREMIUM - Global Investment Platform Based on Neural Network
Body: Neural networks process information in a similar way to the human brain. The network is composed of a large number of highly interconnected processing elements (neurons) working in parallel to solve a specific task. In our software this task is to predict the cryptocurrency price.  After a lot of testing, our neural network shows the average stable return value is ~20%, which is a very high return value compared to existing technical solutions for automatic trading. Also, taking into account that Extremium Software is based on the Self-Organized Incremental Neural Network, we can be sure that the return value will increase over time.
